titles: The assaute and co[n]quest of heuen tra[n]slated out of frenche into englishe by Thomas Paynel.
author: Paynell, Thomas.
date: The yere of our lorde. 1529. The 10. daye of Marche]
publisher: In fletestrete, in the house of Thomas Berthelet, nere to the Cu[n]dite, at the sygne of Lucrece,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
